name: R4B-ContactPoint-R5-ContactPoint
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B ContactPoint into FHIR R5

element.display: Details of a Technology mediated contact point (phone, fax, email, etc.)

target.display: Details of a Technology mediated contact point (phone, fax, email, etc.)
target.comment: R4B `ContactPoint` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint`
R4B `ContactPoint.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.extension`
R4B `ContactPoint.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.id`

element.display: Time period when the contact point was/is in use

target.display: Time period when the contact point was/is in use
target.comment: R4B `ContactPoint.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.period`

element.display: Specify preferred order of use (1 = highest)

target.display: Specify preferred order of use (1 = highest)
target.comment: R4B `ContactPoint.rank` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.rank`

element.display: phone | fax | email | pager | url | sms | other

target.display: phone | fax | email | pager | url | sms | other
target.comment: R4B `ContactPoint.system` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.system` - system has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/contact-point-system|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/contact-point-system|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this contact point

target.display: home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this contact point
target.comment: R4B `ContactPoint.use` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.use` - use has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/contact-point-use|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/contact-point-use|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `ContactPoint.value` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ContactPoint.value`
